newsitem.title: THAILAND: Depressed Thai naval officer kills family, self.
newsitem.headline: Depressed Thai naval officer kills family, self.

text.p: A depressed navy officer in eastern Thailand shot and killed his wife and two children before committing suicide, police said on Thursday.
Police in Rayong province about 200 km (120 miles) southeast of Bangkok found four decomposed bodies late on Wednesday after breaking into the house that belonged to the navy lieutenant.
They said they broke into the residence after receiving complaints from neighbours of a bad smell coming from the house.
Friends of the naval officer said he was depressed about his impending resignation from the navy, police said.
They said he shot his young son, daughter and wife in the head before committing suicide several days ago.
The police have declined to give details of the family's identity.
